page.title: 08SECONDARY SECTOR EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { Peugot-Talbot's}plant sandwiched between the{A45(T)}and the{A423(T) employs some 971 people in the assembly of motorcars. This plant has long been the{major employer}in the area; formerly as part of the Chrysler Company. Jobs are not as secure as before; partly because of increasing automation, partly because of the drop in Home Market sales and partly due to the dependence on a deal with Iran. The{Siskin Drive Industrial Estate is growing in importance as a provider of jobs. There are 25 units already with 4 more being built. Most units are leased from{Coventry Council}or from the{Coventry Trading Estates Co. About a third of the units produce components for the motor trade, a further third deal in vehicle repair. Around 900 are permanently employed on the Industrial Estate.
